title: The Telegram Man
creator_credit: James Khehtie, Ceinwen Berry and Victoria Wharfe McIntyre
brief_description: Multi-award-winning film ‘The Telegram Man’ poignantly depicts the human cost of war in its portrayal of relationships impacted by the vicissitudes of wartime. Featuring restrained but deeply emotional performances from some of Australia’s finest screen actors (Jack Thompson, Gary Sweet and Sigrid Thornton), this is a powerful film about loss, grief and duty.
